thread.title: BRIEF-Nexus REIT Closes Previously Announced Acquisition In Richmond, BC To Acquire Two Single-Tenant Industrial Buildings In Alberta

title: BRIEF-Nexus REIT Closes Previously Announced Acquisition In Richmond, BC To Acquire Two Single-Tenant Industrial Buildings In Alberta

organizations.name: acquire two single-tenant industrial buildings in alberta reuters

text:
May 2, 2018 / 1:25 PM / Updated 9 minutes ago BRIEF-Nexus REIT Closes Previously Announced Acquisition In Richmond, BC To Acquire Two Single-Tenant Industrial Buildings In Alberta Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
May 2 (Reuters) - Nexus Real Estate Investment Trust :
* NEXUS REIT CLOSES PREVIOUSLY ANNOUNCED ACQUISITION IN RICHMOND, BC, ENTERS CONTRACT TO ACQUIRE TWO SINGLE-TENANT INDUSTRIAL BUILDINGS IN NISKU, ALBERTA Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
